column5: Master bedroom with King Bed, 5 minutes from DFW Airport and 6 minutes AT&T stadium / Six Flags / Rangers Stadium area. Located in the HEB district, easy access to Irving and Dallas, I-121, I-183 east and west. Neighborhood is safe and very quiet. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Master Bedroom 5 mins from DFW Airport
